Author: sadgorlthrowwaway
Text: Same I was logging my weight about 2-3lbs too high when I was home- which ultimately makes me feel much better now that I can use my scale. I thought I had gained ~10 lbs over the two weeks I allowed myself to binge, but I’ve been back at my place for 3 days (debloating) and am only up ~2 now. :)   Honestly the two weeks were so worth it to spend time with family and I think it was good for me ultimately even though I’m already fasting again :(
